00048 // This #define allows us to call a method in all
00049 // loaded modules in a readable simple way, e.g.:
00050 // 'FOREACH_MOD OnConnect(user);'
00051 
00052 #define FOREACH_MOD for (int i = 0; i <= MODCOUNT; i++) modules[i]->
